data.message: I listen to the Elton John / Eminem collaboration of 'Stan' constantly, it's incredible!

replies.message: Hey Sparky, I was wondering what you thought of the orginal colab with Dido, I like elton's okay myself, I'm an elton stand alone fan, as well as eminiem fan. no disrespect man, just curious.

What's up Jack! None taken my friend, I love both for different reasons, but that live take on it & dropping some cuss words / being a little more creative with lyrics just edges it. 

It's sometimes difficult to re-create Eminem tracks live using backing tracks etc without it sounding hollow, but this combination with Elton worked to a tee.
